title: Kobol (band)
text:
Kobol is a musical duo from Ensenada, Baja California, Mexico, formed by Ignacio Ch√°vez and Argel Cota- Arhkota. They define their music as "a mixture of jazzy natural low tempo beats, freestyle DSP jams, sly acoustic impressions with dubby vibes".


== Discography ==


=== Albums ===
Centipede (Jan, 2013)
Broken Ebony (Oct, 2005)
Extempore (Nov, 2007)
